com.esri.mo2.map.draw
Interface LegendInfo

All Known Subinterfaces:
GroupRenderer, Renderer, ScaleDependentRenderer, SimpleRenderer, ValueMapRenderer
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseGroupRenderer, BaseRenderer, BaseScaleDependentRenderer, BaseSimpleRenderer, BaseValueMapRenderer
public interface LegendInfo

LegendInfo defines the details necessary for a TOC to be able to render the "classes" within a Legend.

See Also:
Toc

Method Summary
 LegendClass getLegendClass(int i)
          get the LegendClass associated with a particular swatch
 int getLegendClassCount()
          returns the number of legend classes
 String getLegendSubtitle()
          get additional legend title text.
 Feature getLegendSwatchFeature(int i)
          get a sample Feature that can be used by the TOC for drawing a "swatch".
 

Method Detail

getLegendSubtitle

public String getLegendSubtitle()
get additional legend title text. For instance, the SingleFieldRenderers will want to provide the Field name

Returns:
the sub-title text, null == no subtitle

getLegendClassCount

public int getLegendClassCount()
returns the number of legend classes

Returns:
the number of Legend classes

getLegendClass

public LegendClass getLegendClass(int i)
get the LegendClass associated with a particular swatch

Parameters:
i - the swatch index
Returns:
the LegendClass
Throws:
ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the given swatch index is out of bounds
See Also:
getLegendClassCount()

getLegendSwatchFeature

public Feature getLegendSwatchFeature(int i)
get a sample Feature that can be used by the TOC for drawing a "swatch". Normally, this will not have any associated geometry. Instead it will have all the necessary Fields and non-geometry values setup.

Parameters:
i - the index of the swatch
Returns:
a sample Feature
Throws:
ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the given swatch index is out of bounds
